name: Zombies?
description:
Zombies? is a 2d top down shooter where your task is simple; survive the zombie apocalypse.

Well maybe a simple task is not the correct term for trying to murder the undead? However you have to do so using your trusty pistol and quick movement to outwit and kill.

Currently only one weapon in the game which is the mega pistol which will kill initial zombies in 4 hits, after that it will require more effort!

To Control in game:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Aim
